# Origin
Maxilla (below infraorbital foramen) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion
Skin at corner of mouth @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation

[Facial Nerve CN VII]({{< var ref-cn7.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action
